terms.title: Terms of Use for {{appName}}
terms.intro: Welcome to {{appName}}. Your use of the website and our services is subject to your acceptance of the terms of use detailed below.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.body: ‚Ä¢ By using the website or our services, you agree to these Terms of Use and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, you must refrain from using our services.

section2.title: 2. Services We Provide
section2.body:
We provide legal case management services, including:

‚Ä¢ Creating and managing cases
‚Ä¢ Managing customers
‚Ä¢ Managing case stages and stage descriptions
‚Ä¢ Tagging and filtering cases
‚Ä¢ User roles and security

section3.title: 3. Registration and User Accounts
section3.body:
‚Ä¢ Using the services requires registration with a phone number and receiving an OTP code for identification.
‚Ä¢ During registration, we may store data such as name, phone number, email address, and company name.
‚Ä¢ Use of the system is limited to users assigned roles (Admins and Users).

section4.title: 4. Privacy and Data Protection
section4.body:
‚Ä¢ Your information is stored in a secure Azure SQL database.
‚Ä¢ We use JWT authentication to protect user access.
‚Ä¢ Personal information will not be shared with third parties without your consent, except where required by law.

section5.title: 5. Fair Use and Prohibited Activities
section5.body:
When using our services, you agree:

‚Ä¢ Not to use the services for unlawful purposes.
‚Ä¢ Not to disrupt the system or attempt to breach data stores.
‚Ä¢ Not to submit false or misleading information.

section6.title: 6. Liability and Indemnification
section6.body:
‚Ä¢ We strive to provide stable services, but we do not guarantee uninterrupted availability.
‚Ä¢ The company will not be liable for indirect, consequential, or incidental damages resulting from use of the service.
‚Ä¢ Users are responsible for safeguarding their access credentials and the information they enter.

section7.title: 7. Changes and Updates
section7.body: ‚Ä¢ We reserve the right to change these Terms of Use at any time. Updates will be published, and continued use after an update constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

section8.title: 8. Contact
